actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to eliminate the disability requirement from the sick pay exclusion and to make the exclusion available to all individuals regardless of age.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to repeal the disability and income requirements for the sick pay exclusion enacted by the Tax Reform Act of 1976, and to restore prior law. Makes such repeal retroactive to January 1, 1978.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to eliminate the disability requirement from the sick pay exclusion and to make the exclusion available to all individuals regardless of age.
